about_the_game:
Unbalanced, a game where the roles are switched and you play as the villain. In this RPG you play as a psychotic killer who’s on a goal to create unbalance in a world of balance. You go through the lands of Statera, killing anything that gets in your way, or even gazes at you. But very quickly you realize you’re not going unnoticed.

The Knights of Balance

The Knights of Balance, Statera’s primary force keeping the balance of the lands. The Knights are the only thing between you and your goal. Soon you’ll find out the Knights aren’t exactly what you’d expect.

Features:

  • Unique Battle System!
  • 8 Unique Bosses & many more mini bosses!
  • Many different weapons, items, armors and abilities!
  • Completely custom map!
  • 3 Playable Characters.
  • Original Art Style.
  • Original Soundtrack.
